content.rendered:
Directed by Omung Kumar.

Written by Sandeep Singh. Raaj Shaandilyaa. Adnan Ali.

Cast Sunny Leone(Bar Performer). Sanjay Dutt(Arun Sachdeva). Aditi Rao Hydari(Bhoomi). Sharad Kelkar(Neeraj). Govind Pandey(Shaandilyaa). Shekhar Suman(Guide). Riddhi Sen(Jeetu). Sakshi Dwivedi(Diya). Sidhant Gupta(Neeraj). Dimpy Mishra(Babu Tiwari). Shyam Gopal(Neeraj’s Father). Manoj Sharma(Hawaldar).Rahul Verma Rajput. Aparna Kanekar(Old Lady). Poonam Mathur(Malti Ji). Dolly Kaushik(Preeti). Payal Wadhwa(Ghulam’s Girlfriend1). Veer Aryan(Ghulam). Pramjit Singh(DIG / SP). Sarita Sharma(Alka Chachi). Piyushi Malhotra(Dhauli’s Bodyguard). Puru Chibber(Vishal). Surajbhan(Neighbour 1). Soma Jain(Customer). Anuja Chauhan(Sara). Adishree Sharma(Ghazala). Aarti Gupta(Girl In Court). Hemant Gaud(Neighbour 3). Bhavya Gupta(Young Bhoomi). Anil Jain(Jeetu’s Father). Meena Sharma(Patient). Vidya Chibber(Nanda Nigam). Maggie Mather(Sulekha). Rajan Sharma(Rickshaw Puller). Antra(Ghulam’s Girlfriend2). Sanskar Joshi(Customer). Shamsher Qureshi(Neighbour 4). Vandana Kakkar(Neeraj’s Mother). Vivek(Dinesh). Prateek Dubey(Neeraj’s Young Brother). Pramod Rana(Constable). Almas Khan(Arun’s Wife). Hemant Saxena(Neighbour 2). Kaleem Zia(Judge)

Language Hindi.

Producers Hanif Chunawala. Priya Gupta. Pawan Kapoor. Omung Kumar. Vanita Omung Kumar. Zafar Mehdi. Aftab Qureshi. Manish Singh. Sandeep Singh. Piyush Vaishnava.

Production Legend Global Studi. T-Serie. White Turtle Studio.
